data.author: Fellvoid

changelog.release_notes: The first version of the Watchface. It's oriented towards Jesterheads! In Flames We Trust! All rights of the used logo belong to In Flames and respective Creators.

data.description:
This Watchface is created for all the Jesterheads around the world! In Flames We Trust! 
Simple, but stylish, featuring the design of the 2015 Jester logo (From the album "Siren Charms"). Has Bluetooth Connection and Battery indicators, along with the standard date and time. 
The used art belongs to "In Flames" and the respective Creators. This Watchface is meant to be used free by the fans!

Contact me, mail me suggestions or requests at zeroval@abv.bg

Thanks for your time, I hope you enjoy this! Rock on!

latest_release.release_notes: The first version of the Watchface. It's oriented towards Jesterheads! In Flames We Trust! All rights of the used logo belong to In Flames and respective Creators.

data.title: In Flames Jesterhead 2015
